file.title: Background image layout

p.text: Style display wallpaper on the object (to pave tile, stretch out on the object).

p.textAll: All possible background styles are described in Auxiliary words -> background styles .

sample.sampletitle: Options for the background in the button's Style
sample.samplecode: Window1.Knopa1.Stil background = "Scalable" Window1.Knopa1.Stil background = background RastyanutyyWindow1.Knopa1.Stil = Window1.Knopka2.Stil fonaWindow1.Knopa1.Stil background = Window1.Tekst1.Tekst
